DOMU Concept

Community Engagement

This Makes Me Happy

Is a cross-cultural study of what happiness means to us. We focused on the G.D.H. (Gross Domestic Happiness) of specific countries and examined what factors contributed to individual happiness.

Our research on the G.D.H. of specific countries led us to hypothesize that happiness is incredibly subjective. Because of this subjectivity we chose to give out stickers that people could place on the anything that makes them happy. The intention of this was to give individuals a tool that made them think about what makes them happy.

The results of what made them happy were then photographed and sent back to us.

POP Quiz

Pop Quiz was created through Imaging Cities: New Media and Urban Action, a group of American Students studying urban spaces. Our goal was to temporarily activate a transitional area in Copenhagen, DK called Kay Fisker Plads. On average spent less than 15-30 seconds passing through. To slow the pedestrians down we implemented stacks of neon yellow pallets placed strategically around the plaza to gain attention and to give them a place to sit. We then gathered information in the form of a questionnaire from individuals that passed through to find a more permanent solution on how to activate the space.

Research maps of Kay Fisker Plads showing pedestrian paths, transit paths, activity concentrations, and where we strategically placed our painted pallets.

We used this questionnaire to begin a dialogue about Kay Fisker Plads with the hope of using the information collected to improve the space. Results: Q1. Would you dance here? 63% YES Q2. If there was a bar, would you drink here? 69% YES Q3. Would you like to see more color here? 100% YES

User Interface Design

Case Studies

Starz is an American premium cable and satellite television network that provides video streaming services through a mobile application, 10-foot device applications (Roku, Amazon Fire, etc.) & a web application to over 100 million users. They service two video streaming applications Starz their English speaking app & Pantaya their Spanish based app. At Starz, I worked on the web platforms team for both Starz and Pantaya applications assisting with internal projects and also as a lead UI designer on several small-scale projects.
PROJECTS
File and File System Redesign
TEAM | Karie Yoshioka, Kevin Holland, Laurie Wiebener & Ryan McCarthy
Technologies: Sketch, Sketch Plugins, Zeplin & Plant
Challenge | The disarray of the UI files and feature level filing system was making it increasingly difficult to keep up with file maintenance & updates which in turn made it daunting to know the source of truth.
Solution | Create a single master file to be used as the source of truth and to make updates rapidly.

In this process my responsibilites were to symbolize global components, add missing breakpoints, make sure screens are most up to date, repair screens / symbols, create symbol naming convention, maintain pixel perfection, standardize components, design the file structure, and typography / styles.

During this process Sketch released symbol libraries so we quickly adopted this technology. I created a symbols master library and separated the master file which aided in having up-to-date components.

UI Designer and half-stack dev with experience in visual art, branding, and graphic design. My interests rest in finding creative solutions that activate the user experience through beautiful interfaces.
TECH
HTML/CSS/JS, JS Frameworks, Adobe CS, Sketch, Zeplin, Invision, Confluence/Jira, Trello
